root: ^Lena has been going through a rough patch lately, and decides to attend church to find some peace and clarity.
^Talk to the pastor after the service.

Pray: ^Lena spends some time praying for guidance and feels a sense of calm come over her. She realizes that things will be okay, and that she just needs to have faith.
TalkToPastor: ^Lena talks to the pastor after the service, and he offers her some words of encouragement and support. She feels heard and validated, and is grateful for the experience.
^Volunteer to help with the church's outreach programs.
Leave: ^Lena leaves the church feeling no better than when she arrived. She wishes she had reached out to someone for help, but decides to keep her struggles to herself.
